name: Kanev Web Development
slogan: Unique transportation booking and dispatch system
description:
Transportation SaaS - management, booking and dispatch software on the cloud that can be added to any existing website.
Automatic and manual job dispatch.
Suitable for one man operations to thousands of vehicles fleets.

Monthly and annual subscriptions, free trial.

LTV = 33 mo, Churn < 3%

team.name: M Kanev
team.bioHtml: Founder Kanev Web Development • Worked at @kanev.com, @Taxi Booking Pro @DriveNot

jobs.title: Co-founder of SaaS sports clubs management and booking software
jobs.description:
Currently looking for co-founders with experience in the tech for sports/gyms/fitness field and inclined to work on sales.

The role would be a VP of Marketing and Sales (CMO) with the option to receive up to 40% in stocks - based on negotiations.

jobs.title: Co-founder of transportation SaaS software
jobs.description:
Looking for a co-founder interested in growing a SaaS software company for transportation businesses (B2B software with a potential to grow as B2B2C).

Marketing and Sales expertise.
Techie.
Used to working with remote teams.
Preferably located in the USA.

This isn't a paid position. Please do not apply if you are looking for a salary.
I am looking for a co-founder on this project.

The software is already on the market and there is real traction generated.
